name: Analytics Section
description: Displays numerical metrics with visual indicators and percentages. Perfect for KPIs, performance metrics, and statistical data. Use ONLY for numerical metrics and performance indicators - NOT for descriptive facts or capabilities. **CRITICAL: Analytics sections must NOT contain text-only content. Each field must have a structured value (number, percentage, or short text credential) - never use long descriptive paragraphs or prose text as values.**
portfolioDescription: Numerical KPIs, performance metrics, percentages, trends (metric-only, not descriptive facts). **MUST have structured data values (numbers, percentages, short text) - NEVER text-only or descriptive paragraphs.**
bestPractices: Use ONLY for numerical metrics, KPIs, and performance indicators - NOT for descriptive facts or capabilities

**CRITICAL: Analytics sections must NOT contain text-only content. Each field must have a structured value (number, percentage, or short text credential) - never use long descriptive paragraphs or prose text as values.**
Include percentage values for better visualization
Use performance ratings for quick assessment
Value should be a numerical metric, percentage, or short structured text (e.g., 'Preferred SWIFT Alliance Connect partner') - NEVER long descriptive paragraphs or prose text
Examples of valid values: 100 (number), '47.3%' (percentage), '800' (count), 'Preferred SWIFT Alliance Connect partner' (short credential text)

Examples of INVALID values: 'Orange delivers SWIFT Alliance Connect in over 100 countries and operates connectivity for 800+ SWIFT end users worldwide' (descriptive paragraph - use list section instead)

value.description: Metric value - should be a numerical metric, percentage, or short structured text credential (e.g., '47.3%', '53 million+', '99.97%', 'Preferred SWIFT Alliance Connect partner'). **CRITICAL: NEVER use long descriptive paragraphs or prose text as values - analytics sections must have structured data, not text-only content.**
